The GeoTox package can <x y z plus other stuff>, as introduced in [Eccles KM, Karmaus AL, Kleinstreuer NC, Parham F, Rider CV, Wambaugh JF, Messier KP. A geospatial modeling approach to quantifying the risk of exposure to environmental chemical mixtures via a common molecular target. Sci Total Environ. 2023 Jan 10;855:158905. doi: 10.1016/j.scitotenv.2022.158905. Epub 2022 Sep 21. PMID: 36152849; PMCID: PMC9979101.](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36152849/)

## Installation

You can install the development version of GeoTox from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Spatiotemporal-Exposures-and-Toxicology/GeoTox")
```
